casebody.data:
GRIFFITH
v.
HOVIS, et al. No. 257P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Joseph Michael Griffith, pro se. Kari R. Johnson, Assistant Attorney General, for Chaplain Hovis, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of July 2015 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
Jackson, J. recused.
